normalized: we decided to kill some time with the souvenir shop's fried tripe while we waited for the "info broker" to open.

this time, we're able to finish our meal without incident and start off for the "info broker" just as the sun begins to set.

we enter the black market strip.
you'll find it by avoiding the market on the main drag, instead going way down a narrow, out-of-the-way side street.
our "info broker" included, the place is lined on either side with clearly dubious shops open only at night.
they're all dimly lit with queerly colored lights shining deep within that almost make you woozy just looking at them.
they've got everything from the matter-of-course brothelsto black market doctors peddling dark arts from the demon world.
guns and weapons you'd never find on the "outside", ultra-powerful drugs in the same vein, slaves like i narrowly avoided becoming up for sale… you get the idea.
in short, a place that puts only the illegal and inhuman up for sale -- that's the black market.
